info.title: Open Education API
info.description:
OpenAPI (fka Swagger) specification for the Open Education API.

# Error responses
Error responses are formatted in the `problem+json` media type ([RFC7807](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7807)):

```
{
  "code": 404,
  "title": "Resource not found"
}
```

tags.name: service metadata
tags.description: The service API provides additional metadata needed to make the OOAPI fit for this organization.

tags.name: organizations
tags.description: The organizations API provides the organizations that are responsible for the execution and recognition of education.

tags.name: persons
tags.description: The persons API provides information about persons related to an organization.

tags.name: academic sessions
tags.description: The academic sessions API provides information about the different time periods a program can be offered.

tags.name: programs
tags.description: The programs API provides a coherent set of educational components, aimed at the realization of competences or objectives in the field of knowledge, insight, attitudes and skills that the person who completes the program must have.

tags.name: courses
tags.description: The courses API provides a self-contained and formally structured learning experience. Aimed at providing learning outcomes to students. Usually placed in the context of a program.

tags.name: components
tags.description: The components API provides information about components being part of parent courses.

tags.name: offerings
tags.description: The offerings API provides information about offerings which have a global timeframe, e.g. a period to which students can enroll.

tags.name: associations
tags.description: The associations API provides information about the association between an offering and a person (e.g. students, lecturers, etc).

tags.name: buildings
tags.description: The building API provides a building that is currently used by the organization. Including all location details.

tags.name: rooms
tags.description: The rooms API provides the part of a building where an activity can take place. Including detail information on the resources available, number of seats, etc. (Updated continuously)

tags.name: news
tags.description: The news API provides news feeds and items regarding a specific subject.

get.description: Get metadata for the service.

contactEmail.description: Contact e-mail address of the service owner

specification.description: URL of the API specification (YAML or JSON, compliant with [Open API Specification v3](https://github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification/))

documentation.description: URL of the API documentation, including general terms and privacy statement

get.description: Get an ordered list of all persons.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items per page

pageSize.description: The number of items per page

givenName.description: The first name of this person

surnamePrefix.description: The prefix of the family name of this person

surname.description: The family name of this person

displayName.description: The name of this person which will be displayed

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of this person, RFC3339 (full-date)

cityOfBirth.description: The city of birth of this person

countryOfBirth.description: The country of birth of this person

dateOfNationality.description: The date of nationality of this person, RFC3339 (full-date)

mail.description: The primary e-mailaddress of this person

secondaryMail.description: The secondary e-mailaddress of this person

telephoneNumber.description: The telephone number of this person

mobileNumber.description: The mobile number of this person

photoSocial.description: The url of the informal picture of this person

photoOfficial.description: The url of the official picture of this person

titlePrefix.description: A title prefix to be used for this person

titleSuffix.description: A title suffix to be used for this person

office.description: The name of the office where this person is located

additional.description: Further details like building name, suite, apartment number, etc.
additional.example: On the other side of the road

geolocation.description: Geolocation of the entrance of this address (WGS84 coordinate reference system)

languageOfChoice.description: The language(s) of choice for this person, RFC3066

get.description: Get an ordered list of all organizations, ordered by name.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items per page

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Filter by items having a name, abbreviation or description containing the given search term (exact partial match, case insensitive)

pageSize.description: The number of items per page

description.description: Any general description of the organization should clearly mention the type of higher education organization, especially in the case of a binary system. In Dutch; universiteit (university) or hogeschool (university of applied sciences).

additional.description: Further details like building name, suite, apartment number, etc.
additional.example: On the other side of the road

geolocation.description: Geolocation of the entrance of this address (WGS84 coordinate reference system)

get.description: Get a single organization.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Optional properties to include, separated by a comma

description.description: Any general description of the organization should clearly mention the type of higher education organization, especially in the case of a binary system. In Dutch; universiteit (university) or hogeschool (university of applied sciences).

additional.description: Further details like building name, suite, apartment number, etc.
additional.example: On the other side of the road

geolocation.description: Geolocation of the entrance of this address (WGS84 coordinate reference system)

allOf.description: These properties are only present when explicitly included

get.description: Get an ordered list of all programs for a given organization, ordered by name.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items per page

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Filter by items having a name, abbreviation or description containing the given search term (exact partial match, case insensitive)

pageSize.description: The number of items per page

abbreviation.description: The abbreviation of this program

ects.description: The number of EC's that can be archieved in this program

qualificationAwarded.description: Type of qualificaton that can be obtained on finishing the program

lengthOfProgram.description: The duration of this program in months

levelOfQualification.description: Level of qualification according to the National Qualification Framework and the European Qualifications Framework

profileOfProgram.description: Brief description of the main focus of the program.

learningOutcomes.description: List of learning outcomes at program level. It is advisable to limit the number of learning outcomes to approximately 20. It is also advisable to make sure that the program learning outcomes in the course catalogue correspond with those on the Diploma Supplement.

get.description: Get an ordered list of all courses for a given organization, ordered by name.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items per page

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Filter by items having a name, abbreviation or description containing the given search term (exact partial match, case insensitive)

pageSize.description: The number of items per page

abbreviation.description: The abbreviation or internal code used to identify this course (ECTS-code)

ects.description: The number of EC's that is earned when the course is completed successfully (ECTS-ects)

learningOutcomes.description: Statements that describe the knowledge or skills students should acquire by the end of a particular course (ECTS-learningoutcome)

requirements.description: The requirements needed to enter this course (ECTS-prerequisites)

level.description: The level of this course (ECTS-year of study if applicable)

modeOfDelivery.description: The mode of delivery of the component (ECTS-mode of delivery)

enrollment.description: The extra information that is provided for enrollment

resources.description: An overview of the literature and other resources that is used in this course (ECTS-recommended reading and other sources)

assessment.description: A description of the way exams for this course are taken (ECTS-assessment method and criteria)
